author: Sean Killeen, Excella Consulting
name: Neo4j WebAPI
description: A project that contains a dockerized neo4j instance and a WebAPI project with tests that can talk to it.

projectShortName.description: The short name for the project. Will be in the solution, project names, dockerfile, etc. Keep it to letters and numbers, no dashes or symbols, etc.

webApiPortNumber.description: The port number of the WebAPI that your host machine will be able to see. Will be mapped from the docker container.

neo4jHttpPort.description: The exposed port number for neo4j http so that you can access it directly

neo4jHttpsPort.description: The exposed port number for neo4j http so that you can access it directly

neo4jBoltPort.description: The exposed port number for neo4j bolt protocol so that you can access it directly

neo4jpassword.description: The password for the 'neo4j' user that connects to the DB.
